course_title: Special Topic w/Field: Adv Field Ecology
course_description: A course designed for advanced students on topics of interest in environmental sciences. Lecture with required field trips. This course may count as an upper level field course for the ENVS major; relevant topics may count as elective credit for ENVS minors. See current course atlas.
sections:
